group.label: Advanced Settings
group.comment: The advanced settings can change how the search works. Please edit them with caution and only if you know what they are doing.

field.label: Internal IPs
field.comment: Requests from these IPs will be excluded from your license plan

field.label: Use URL parameters?
field.comment: If set to true, the http parameters of the current search are pushed to the browser url.

field.label: Only search parameters?
field.comment: If present, URL parameters like 'channel' and 'sid' are omitted in the URL. This can be used in conjunction with parameter-whitelist

field.label: Parameter whitelist
field.comment: If any URL parameters are omitted through other attributes like use-url-parameter="false" or only-search-params you can add specific important parameters manually. Just use a comma separated list like: parameter-whitelist="param1,myParam"

field.label: Add search parameters
field.comment: With this property you can deliver standard parameters which will then be attached to the search request. Example: param1=abc,param2=xyz.

field.label: Add tracking parameters
field.comment: With this property you can deliver standard parameters which are attached to every tracking request. Example: param1=abc,param2=xyz.

field.label: Keep URL parameters
field.comment: Determines if parameters which are written into the URL should be kept.
